thread.title: Great stay
thread.title_full: Great stay - Review of 1K Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eloise S
title: Great stay
text:
Amazing staff and accommodated email request. The hotel is very well situated hotel. Room was very clean and comfy and maintained to a high standard.
Close to good restaurants and bars with good transfer links.
Room Tip: Deluxe L room room 335 was awesome and had a lovely round free standing tub. But beware toilet has n... See more room tips
